name: Dynamite Bunny: Catch The Carrot
description: Dynamite Bunny has been waiting long to get his beloved carrot, however now you can make his dream come true. He loves explosions, and does no matter what to get to the carrot, but he has a little time left, because the carrot can go bad soon.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-4170 CPU @ 3.70GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 4400 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
